reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel
reviews.title: A wonderful anniversary break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The reception was well staffed and we were promptly shown to our room. Unfortunately the room was not suitable but another was arranged very quickly and without question. The room (211) is a suite overlooking the gardens. It was a very well appointed room, with a large bathroom and lots of natural light. The sheets were spotless, as was the bathroom which had lovely Arran Aromatics soaps and shampoos. We had a very comfortable stay for three nights - the bed was huge and very comfortable. The room was not too warm, a problem which I have found in hotels previously. The tv was a huge flatscreen affair with freeview and the usual iron, ironing board and hairdryer available too.
reviews.title: attention needed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The food
reviews.title: Very Enjoyable Stay - Girly Getaway Vital Spa Break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As we were on a DBB rate, we were very please to see that we were offered the full menu in the restaurant. The dinner portions are deceptively large. We enjoyed fish and chips - which came with bread and butter, scampi and chips, scallops with risotto, french onion soup and chicken liver terrine. (not all at the one time!). On our last night we had sirloins which were cooked to perfection! Really delicious.
reviews.title: Very Enjoyable Stay For 70th Birthday Treat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfasts were lovely too, the continental fare was ample, with lovely fruit juices and fresh cooked meats and pastries. A full selection of cereals were also available.
reviews.title: Beautiful Setting

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our first stay at this lovely hotel. All the staff were friendly, helpful and considerate, the room was comfortable with a view of the extensive grounds. The food in the restaurant was superb and we look forward to our next visit!
reviews.title: Our short break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: had a 2 night stay here and was very happy with the location, room and cleanliness however the service was atrocious, we had to queue for breakfast on both mornings even though when we did get in there was made up empty tables, the portions are small and very expensive.
reviews.title: forget the restaurant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we had booked a evening meal for the saturday night and though the food was excellent ( when we eventually recieved it ) the service was a joke, we had to wait 40 mins for the starters, they forgot our drinks order twice! then the side order was forgotten and when we reminded a waitress she said its on its way but we had finished our meal and it still never arrived, after the waiter came and asked if we wanted a dessert but we never saw him again, we gave it another 25 mins and got up and walked out and went to the bar.
reviews.title: Quiet Weekend Away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we arrived in the bar and found 2 people in front of us but they didnt have any of the bottles of wine one of the customers in front of us wanted and then the waiter didnt know what brandy was and left to ask someone, we waited 25 mins before getting served and went to bed early very dissapointed, how they got 2 rosettes i will never know.
reviews.title: My Engagement At Craxton!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the waiters and waitresses seem to be let loose in the restaunt with no organisation and dont pass on orders or just forget them however after we complained at checkout we had the £26 bill for our extras and drinks knocked off by the duty manageress, i wont be going again!
reviews.title: A pleasant stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Summer Vegetable Soup was dissapointing, it was very bitter to the taste and poorly seasoned. The cured salmon was nice and beautifully presented, but there was no bread on the table which I found unusual.
reviews.title: Expensive Meal which was a bit Dissapointing!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012
reviews.text: Scampi and chips was very nice, but priced at £15, very expensive.
reviews.title: Nice hotel let down by moldy bathroom, rude staff and bad food.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The sirloin steak was excellent, but served with very soggy chips which weren't very warm and a cold portebello mushroom!
reviews.title: SPA DAY

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: None of the staff came to the table and asked if everything was ok or if we needed more drinks (which we did) so we just ate the meal.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, Restaurant poor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The desserts were offered but we declined and the bill was immediately brought to the table. We weren't offered coffee or a liquer and the word thank you wasn't used once during the evening.
reviews.title: Wonderful weekend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here on a dinner bed and breakfast deal. We paid £109.00 which also included a bottle of wine in the room.
reviews.title: Comfortable hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Room had all the usual facilities. The bed was comfortable. The room and bathroom were reasonably clean. There was quite a bit of mold though on the ceiling above the shower which I thought let the hotel down as this should have been promptly dealt with.
reviews.title: not impressed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: There was a bit of a wait at check in - but reception (think his name was Christopher) never got flustered and dealt with everyone in an efficient and friendly manner.
reviews.title: Weekend stay at Craxton Wood

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The meal at the Aiden Byrne restaurant was extremely good value. I had the steak and my partner had the fish. Both dishes were very tasty and we were recommended a decent bottle of wine. We ordered our food whilst having a drink in the bar. Although we enjoyed our meal and the staff were attentive, I thought the restaurant lacked that all important ambience. The round tables reminded me of an office meeting table, and paper napkins are always a pet hate of mine.
reviews.title: A lovely birthday treat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: We really enjoyed breakfast. The danish pastries were delicious.. There was a cooked breakfast made to order if desired and the staff delivered with a smile.
reviews.title: Very good
